ygData.subject: Re: attacking the alliance
ygData.msgSnippet: Where would you find limited cover? The only thing for miles around is the ocean. I don t think waves offer too good a protection. Also, please don t post

Subject: Re: attacking the alliance
Message-ID: <92hbsu+7v24@...>

X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: Yanshosh@...

Where would you find limited cover? The only thing for miles around 
is the ocean. I don't think waves offer too good a protection.

Also, please don't post damage for my ship. It'll take alot more than 
what you're firing right now to weaken the shields to any really 
noticable. Remember, it took 30 Alliance bots over a week (real time) 
of battle to take down the Cybertronian Fire's shields, and the Iron 
Fist is stronger than the Cybertronian Fire.

One last thing, please post for my Lavacons attacking your troops.

::Zardus/Havoc/Astral/Fenox/Starlight/Griplash/Recklessa/Slayer::

The shots fired by the Trainers hit the shields, Zardus laughing. He 
loved this Predacon technology. Zardus fires back at Prebon with 
three shots from his plasma launcher.

"Yes, it appears the Mighty Zardus has," he says, "Although I'd be 
interested to know why you are attacking my base."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Slayer and Recklessa plunge into the water, both trying to get at 
each other. The underwater defences of the Iron Fist begin to 
activate.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Havoc smiles as the shots from Bullet's disruptor are intercepted by 
the shields. The shields let things out, but they didn't let them in.

Havoc fires two missiles at Bullet, still laughing.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The Lavacons continue to fire at the Trainers.






--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> OK Yanshosh, since theres already been posts involving cover I'll 
say
> limited cover. As for distance, they're supposedly a superior race 
three
> miles is nothing to thier main weapons.
> 
> Bullet looks up, seeing havok, The missles head toward him faster 
than he
> can react. Suddenly the missles explode in mid air as a burst of 
energy
> strikes them down. Blaze stands, disruptor in hand awaiting further 
attacks.
> She aims at Hovok firing three shots from her disruptor.
> 
> Ignatius joins Slayer in his attempts to bring down Wheeljack. he 
fires his
> eyebeams at the Alliance bot, and two missles at the shields 
covering the
> power unit.
> 
> Hammer rises again and fires an energy beam across the battlefield, 
moving
> back and forth at Sharpedge and Godfather.
> 
> "We're taking abuse here" Hammer calls out. With the limited cover 
he didn't
> feel such a small unit could be much effect.
> 
> Prebon believed differently though as he continued to push for 
advancement,
> the disruptorblasts were doing thier job and weakening the shields 
but it
> still wasn't fast enough. "Continue the advance, so far theres been 
little
> resistance, as long as they can't call for reinforcements we have 
the upper
> hand." Prebons inspirational words pushed the Trainers forward with 
the need
> for success or deleation. Failure was not a possability or an 
option.
